sentence: Bill’s record of upholding the law and going after criminals speaks for itself.” On the campaign trail, McSwain points to himself as the only prosecutor in the Republican gubernatorial primary race and the opposite of the prosecutor who is running unopposed in his bid for the Democratic gubernatorial nomination: Josh Shapiro.
author: Pennlive.Com
title: Trump weighs in on Pa. governor’s race, naming candidate he's not endorsing

sentence: READ MORE: Attorney General Josh Shapiro is the presumptive Democratic nominee for governor.
title: Former President Donald Trump Slams Bill McSwain, Who’d Sought His Endorsement For Pennsylvania Governor

sentence: Attorney General Josh Shapiro is the presumptive Democratic nominee for governor.
title: Trump slams McSwain, who’d sought his endorsement for gov

sentence: The nine-person field has some state GOP officials worried that a badly divided primary electorate will choose a nominee who can’t beat presumptive Democratic nominee Josh Shapiro, the state attorney general.
author: Associated Press
title: Trump intervenes in Pennsylvania GOP gubernatorial primary

sentence: The primary election is May 17, and the winner of the Republican nomination will take on state Attorney General Josh Shapiro, the presumed Democratic nominee.
title: Bill McSwain still touts Trump connection even though the ex-president trashed him
